abstract: Bank of New York Mellon’s chief executive, Robert P. Kelly, has again told employees in an internal memo obtained by DealBook that he’s staying, despite entreaties from “another bank” (read: Bank of America).

lead_paragraph: He’s said it before, and he’s saying it again: Robert P. Kelly is staying at Bank of New York Mellon as its chief executive.

headline.main: Bank of N.Y. Chief Says He’s Staying Put (Again)
